Allocation Rejection Codes

This page enables the user to configure a set of rejection codes as per the business requirement. The manager and system admin can view and edit this screen.

Allocators can specify allocation submission notes to enable the manager to review and approve/reject an allocation.

Managers can review an allocation along with submission notes and reject the allocation by selecting an appropriate allocation rejection code along with rejection notes.  

Both allocators and managers can review the trail of submission and rejection notes along with rejection codes.

Indicators for rejection notes are displayed in the allocation maintenance screen and corresponding tiles in rejected allocation screen.

 

Filters

  • Rejection Code

Creating a Rejection Code

     To create a new Rejection Code:

 

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Allocation > Allocation Rejection Codes.
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Rejection Code window.
  4. Enter the Rejection Code and specify the Description for rejection.
  5. Click the Save button.
All mandatory fields are denoted with *.

Editing a Rejection Code

  You can edit the attributes of a Rejection Code using one of the below procedures:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Allocation > Allocation Rejection Codes
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the edit Rejection Code window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save to save the modified rejected details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required rejected record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the edit Rejection Code window.
  3. Click Save to save the modified rejected details.

Details View

  • Select the required record card and you can view the action buttons displayed on the footer section.
  • Click Details from the action button, to view the rejection code details.

 

Deleting a Rejection Code

Admin or managers can delete this.

The rejection code records can be deleted by following one of the below procedures:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Allocation > Allocation Rejection Codes.
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  4. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of rejection code is irreversible'.
  5. Click Yes to delete the rejection code.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of rejection code is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the rejection code.

 

Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Rejection Code Specifies the rejection code.
Description Specifies the description for rejection.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Create Opens the Rejected Code window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Rejected Code window.
Delete Deletes the selected record.
Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of rejected code attributes, the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
